forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 47F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the evening, overcast overnight with occasional rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
